messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/4/03 10:59:36 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Kcbigmomma@... writes:

> My daughter had told me awhile back that she had emailed your
> daughter but she must no longer have same email address as it was
> returned.If she's still interested in writing

yep, she has changed it several times :0) I'll find out if she is still
interested, she gets online in spurts, like everything else LOL

Ang
Unschooling mom to
Megan(10) Ashlyn(3) Christian(1.5)

messages.subject: Hello Ang!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Ang, I remember you quite well!! Hope you and your family are doing good. I ll look over your web pages soon. My daughter had told me awhile back that
messages.messageBody:
Hello Ang,
I remember you quite well!! Hope you and your family are doing
good. I'll look over your web pages soon.
My daughter had told me awhile back that she had emailed your
daughter but she must no longer have same email address as it was
returned.If she's still interested in writing I'll have Dominique
send through your email address if it's ok w/you?? I know my daughter
got a little out of the writing mode for a bit (alot like her mother
LOL!!!)
Well, anyway thanks for saying hi. It's nice to hear from you!!!
Kimberly
